metadata.name: Amazonia 01
metadata.description: Deep in the heart of the Peruvian Amazon, lies the village of El Chino, accessible only by boat. Village life is simple, although they are slowly modernizing. The river is still used for bathing and washing clothes. In this image, a mom is bathing and washing her clothes, with her child eagerly helping. The village is supported through the charity, Angels of the Amazon.
